children.name: a
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that they did in a body run upon our swords, in the which, the greater number of them were slain; and the remainder of them broke through and fled from us.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that we did meet the spies of our armies, who had been sent out to watch the camp of the Lamanites.

children.name: because
children.sourceText: And it came to pass because of their rebellion we did cause that our swords should come upon them.

children.name: could
children.sourceText: And behold, when they had fled and we could not overtake them, we took our march with speed towards the city Cumeni; and behold, we did arrive in time that we might assist our brethren in preserving the city.

children.name: down
children.sourceText: Behold, we did start to go down to the land of Zarahemla with our prisoners.

children.name: for
children.sourceText: And blessed is the name of our God; for behold, it is he that has delivered us; yea, that has done this great thing for us.

children.name: from
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that they did in a body run upon our swords, in the which, the greater number of them were slain; and the remainder of them broke through and fled from us.

children.name: he
children.sourceText: And blessed is the name of our God; for behold, it is he that has delivered us; yea, that has done this great thing for us.

children.name: in
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that our prisoners did hear their cries, which caused them to take courage; and they did rise up in rebellion against us.

children.name: it
children.sourceText: And blessed is the name of our God; for behold, it is he that has delivered us; yea, that has done this great thing for us.

children.name: might

children.sourceText: Behold, we did start to go down to the land of Zarahemla with our prisoners.

children.name: our

children.name: out
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that we did meet the spies of our armies, who had been sent out to watch the camp of the Lamanites.

children.name: should
children.sourceText: And it came to pass because of their rebellion we did cause that our swords should come upon them.

children.name: that

children.name: the
children.sourceText: Behold, we did start to go down to the land of Zarahemla with our prisoners.

children.name: their
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that our prisoners did hear their cries, which caused them to take courage; and they did rise up in rebellion against us.

children.name: them
children.sourceText: And they cried unto us, saying, Behold, the armies of the Lamanites are marching towards the city of Cumeni; and behold, they will fall upon them, yea, and will destroy our people.

children.name: they
